MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: description: Windows apps share a common look-and-feel across PCs, mobile devices, and many other kinds of devices. The user interface, input, and interaction patterns are very similar, and a user moving between devices will welcome the familiar experience. title: Porting Windows Phone Silverlight to UWP for form factor and UX ms.assetid: 96244516-dd2c-494d-ab5a-14b7dcd2edbd
